attributes.action: Repeal or amend the Online Safety Act to protect free speech and privacy
attributes.additional_details: The Act requires intrusive age checks and monitoring that risk breaching data protection, privacy, and free expression. Citizens must be able to access lawful content without surveillance or censorship.
attributes.background: Review and amend the Online Safety Act 2023 to ensure compliance with UK GDPR, the Human Rights Act, and protections for privacy and freedom of speech.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Repeal the Online Safety Act
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/722903
